trans-unit.source: +2: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of their library into their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: +2: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of their library into their graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Choose one — • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

trans-unit.resname: SS1·2 | Blue Elemental Blast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Contrary to popular wisdom, I find it's best to fight fire with its opposite."
trans-unit.target: "Contrary to popular wisdom, I find it's best to fight fire with its opposite."

trans-unit.source: Brainstorm
trans-unit.target: Brainstorm

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

trans-unit.source: "I have a plan. Actually, I have three."
trans-unit.target: "I have a plan. Actually, I have three."

trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: Counterspell

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell.

trans-unit.source: Gifts Ungiven
trans-unit.target: Gifts Ungiven

trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: Mystical Tutor
trans-unit.target: Mystical Tutor

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

trans-unit.source: "It's not just what you know. It's knowing where to find what you don't."
trans-unit.target: "It's not just what you know. It's knowing where to find what you don't."

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: Negate

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: Counter target noncreature spell.
